result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Anthony Marcel Hernandez

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Anthony Marcel Hernandez appeared by video.  Attorney Haley E Wentz in court for Anthony Marcel Hernandez.  Prosecuting attorney Navjot Singh Hira in court for the State of Wisconsin. Case in Court for Calendar Call. DEFENDANT APPEARS. Court canceled stayed bench warrant. Discussion held to determine the posture of the case. Defense requests a status date. Court ordered this case adjourned back to Branch 15.
Status conference scheduled for November 8, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Attorney Haley E Wentz in court.  Navjot Singh Hira appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney appeared by video means.
CASE HEARD OFF THE RECORD DUE TO COURT REPORTER AVAILABILITY. 
Case in court for calendar call. 
Defense counsel informed the Court that defendant is currently hospitalized and is unable to appear. 
State informed the Court that the defendant has a pending felony matter (22CF3213) in Branch 38.
Court ordered the stayed bench warrant to remain in effect until the next court date.
Court ordered case adjourned for Calendar Call in Branch 15.  Calendar call scheduled for September 27, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Attorney Haley E Wentz in court.  Navjot Singh Hira appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.  
Matter scheduled for Status Conference.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until the next court date.  Calendar call scheduled for August 16, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Anthony Marcel Hernandez in court with attorney Haley E Wentz.  Julie D Knyszek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
 Case in court for a Status Conference. Discussion held. Defense request additional time  for reasons placed on the record. 
 Court ordered matter adjourned. Effective  July 30, 2022  this calendar will be assigned to Judge JD Watts, Branch 15  in Room 623 of the Courthouse.
  Status conference scheduled for August 5, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant Anthony Marcel Hernandez in court with attorney Haley E Wentz.  Julie D Knyszek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a scheduling conference. Defendant has received partial discovery from the State and needs the remaining discovery. Defense requests adjournment. 
Court ordered matter adjourned back to branch 19.  Status conference scheduled for July 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Anthony Marcel Hernandez in court with attorney Haley E Wentz.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
HEARING HELD VIA ZOOM/ LIVE STREAMING THROUGH DACAST. Case in court for Scheduling Conference. 
Discussion held off the record.  Defense imissing some  discovery (photgraphs) and request an adjournment. State to follow up. 
Court ordered matter adjourned back to Branch 19. Parties advised this hearing will be held in person, Room 623 of the Courthouse.  Scheduling conference scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Anthony Marcel Hernandez in court with attorney Haley E Wentz.  Julie D Knyszek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
HEARING HELD VIA ZOOM/ LIVE STREAMING THROUGH DACAST. Case in court for a Pretrial Conference.
Defense in receipt of discovery and offer and request time to review and discuss with the defendant. 
Court ordered matter adjourned back to Branch 19 This hearing will be be held streamed Live through dacast- via Zoom.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 24, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.

Defendant Anthony Marcel Hernandez in court with attorney Haley E Wentz.  Defendant Anthony Marcel Hernandez in custody.  Matthew James Torbenson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Anthony Marcel Hernandez appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Ashley, Branch 19. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned to Br. 19 for pretrial.  
This hearing will be streamed Live through DACAST: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/21a87aec-ffb6-5325-fb81-55812563aa79  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 26, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
